lines.text: Yes, Mr. Mandick. No, I didn't come in for work. See, I was shot in the head recently by a call girl. Yes, I'm feeling much better. I'm fired? Okay, thank you very much.
Your bare torso was most unattractive.
Enough with the breasts! I'll kill you!
You remind me of a serial killer.
I'm in no mood to have my breasts pawed at.
